title: Promote current preview deployment to live Internet Computer URL (production)

requirements.text: Promote the currently deployed preview build (reported as Version 55) to the live/production Internet Computer URL following the existing preview-to-production runbook, without introducing any code or configuration changes.
acceptanceCriteria: Promotion is executed as a deployment-only operation (no application code changes, no configuration changes).
The production/live frontend canister serves the app successfully at the default IC URL.
The production/live deployment uses the same build artifacts as the current preview build (Version 55).

requirements.text: Complete pre-publish verification for the preview build and document the results in a version-specific promotion record markdown file under `frontend/docs/promotions/` (create `frontend/docs/promotions/version-55-preview-to-production.md` if it does not exist), including PASS/PASS WITH NOTES/FAIL outcomes, notes, issue classification, and the required attestation that no code/config changes were made.
acceptanceCriteria: A promotion record exists for Version 55 under `frontend/docs/promotions/` and includes completed checklist sections for the key flows listed in `frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-production.md`.
The promotion record contains explicit attestation statements that application code changes = NONE and configuration changes = NONE.
The promotion record includes an overall status and a recommendation (PROCEED WITH PROMOTION / DO NOT PROMOTE).

requirements.text: After promotion, provide the new live Internet Computer access details by recording the production frontend canister URL and the backend canister ID in a deployment record under `frontend/docs/deployments/` (create a Version 55 production deployment record if needed) and ensure the live links are discoverable from the documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment record for Version 55 exists under `frontend/docs/deployments/` and includes: frontend canister ID, default IC URL, and backend canister ID.
The documented production URL loads the app and the frontend can reach the backend canister without showing a backend connectivity error under normal conditions.

constraints: Follow `frontend/docs/publish-preview-to-production.md` runbook for the promotion process.
Do not introduce any application code changes during promotion.
Do not introduce any configuration changes during promotion.
nonGoals: Generate or provide an Android APK build (not supported in this platform flow).
Add new app features as part of the promotion.
